name: Sword Dude
description:
Play as a nondescript bastion of chivalry as you hack and slash your way to the bottom of an infinite dungeon. Kill masked goblins and flying eyeballs, take their gold, and trade it for weapons and potions—guiltlessly.

Half rogue-like, half dungeon crawler, all high fantasy.


[A fun project I made over the summer— more weapons and mobs to be added, if I decide to come back to this.]

~~~~~Controls~~~~~

Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys

Primary Weapon - Left Mouse

Secondary Weapon - Right Mouse

Roll - Shift

Interact - E

~~~~~Credits~~~~~

Tileset and several sprites: 16x16 DungeonTileset II by 0x72

Sword: Sword by KingKelpo

Shopkeep: 2D Pixel Dungeon Asset Pack by Pixel_Poem

Some weapons: Shikashi's Fantasy Icons Pack by shikashiassets

E Key: Gerald's Keys by Gerald Burke
